  hEY PALS EXISTA VIRUS THAT DOESN'T NEED ATTACHMENT TO SPREAD, IT JUST NEED TO SPREAD THE ADDRESS LIST OF YOUR EMAILS. THIS VIRUS CAN'T BE DETECTED BY ANTIVIRUS AND START TO DESTROY YOUR HARDHWARE IN 5O DAYS!!!. i'LL TOLD YOU HOW ERASED IT. 
   GO TO START AND AFTER THAT TO FIND 
   IN SEARCH FILES TYPE this SULFNBK.EXE  (virus' name) 
   check that you're searching in drice c 
   push the search button. 
   if the file appear (it has a black ugly icon with name: sulfnbk.exe)  DON'T OPEN IT!!!! 
   SELECT THE ICON and eliminate it 
   when a small screen appear and ask you if you like to send the file to recicle bin, select "yes". 
   Go to main screen (where all you icons appear) and open recicle bin 
   select the file sulfnbk.exe and erase it again
CHECK THAT THE FILE IS ERASED, IF YOU FIND THIS FILE IN YOUR DRIVE C SEND THIS EMAIL TO ALL ADDRES IN YOUR ADDRES' LIST, 'CAUSE THAT'S THE WAY TO WORK THIS VIRUS, WITHOUT KNOW IT YOU COULD PASS THIS VIRUS TO ALL YOUR FRIENDS  CYA
